messages.content: are all the angles equal in a parallelogram
No, opposite angles in a parallelogram are equal, while adjacent angles are supplementary.
can you own a skunk in the uk
No, owning a skunk is illegal in the UK.
does a fried egg have a runny yolk
It can! Many people enjoy sunny-side-up or over-easy eggs for that.
is a tax free savings account an investment
No, it’s a savings account offering tax-free interest, not an investment.
is a father in law considered a relative
Yes, a father-in-law is indeed considered a relative.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel is not part of the European Economic Area.
is st kitts and nevis a us territory
No, it is an independent country, not a US territory.
are there any states where you can marry your sibling
No, marrying a sibling is illegal in all U.S. states.
is the us postal service part of the federal government
Yes, it is an independent establishment of the federal government.
does dying light the following enhanced edition come with the original game
Yes, it includes the original game along with all expansions.
